description: A super easy, fragrant and summery Ginger Peach Smoothie to start your day.  Just blend peaches, banana, ginger and plant milk and you're done. See my tips for prepping ahead to make it even quicker for busy mornings!
keywords: ginger peach smoothie, ginger smoothie, peach smoothie, vegan peach smoothie
name: Ginger Peach Smoothie
recipeIngredient: 2 ripe juicy peaches (, (You can use frozen peaches but if you do use a fresh banana and not a frozen one)
1 tablespoon maple syrup (optional - add to taste or not at all)
1 approx 2 1/2 inches long stick fresh ginger (, roughly x 1/2 inch wide)

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the pits from the peaches and add them along with the other ingredients to a blender. I recommend starting with only half of the fresh ginger or 1/4 teaspoon of ground ginger.
Blend until smooth then give it a taste. Add a little more ginger if you want a stronger flavour.
